bio:
Ardwen is a traveling Bosmer priestess. Ardwen is on her way to Whiterun. Upon talking to her, she will reveal that she is heading to the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun after hearing that the Gildergreen had been restored. Eating the fruit of this tree supposedly adds years to your life.
Ardwen travels with a dog. Despite always being with the dog, she seems to dislike it, calling it a "stupid mutt."
She can often be seen with her hands up as if she is praying.
Quotes:
"We are traveling to the Shrine of Kynareth in Whiterun. I hear the Gildergreen is more beautiful than ever since it's been restored."
name: Ardwen
